title: Bug 110566: Wrong data set result returned when setting an invalid filter expression for row[0]
description: When setting a filter like 'row[0] equals to 0' in the data set, or just returning a null result set, the data set result is incorrect.
OB: When setting a filter expression like 'row[0] equals to 0' in the data set and clicking on the Preview tab, the first result record is returned instead of the expected null result set.
EB: The developer stated that 'row[0]' can only be generated after all the data has been fetched and cannot be used as a filter expression.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Set a filter in the data set with the expression 'row[0] equals to 0'. 
2. Click on the Preview tab and observe the actual result.
